list.name: processName
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "source.instantRate" WITH KEY = "process"

list.name: env
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "source.instantRate" WITH KEY = "env"

targets.query: SELECT sum("value") FROM "source.instantRate" WHERE "process" =~ /$processName$/ AND "host" =~ /$hosts$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "process" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "end.instantRate" WHERE "process" =~ /$processName$/ AND "host" =~ /$hosts$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "process" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "dead_end.instantRate" WHERE "process" =~ /$processName$/ AND "env" =~ /^$env$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "process", "action" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "dead_end.instantRate" WHERE "process" =~ /$processName$/ AND "host" =~ /$hosts$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "process", "action" fill(null)
SELECT max("value") FROM "serviceTimes.OK.p50" WHERE "process" =~ /$processName$/ AND "env" =~ /^$env$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "process", "action" fill(null)
SELECT max("value") FROM "serviceTimes.FAIL.p50" WHERE "process" =~ /$processName$/ AND "env" =~ /^$env$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "process", "action" fill(null)
SELECT max("value") FROM "serviceTimes.FAIL.p99" WHERE "process" =~ /$processName$/ AND "env" =~ /^$env$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "process", "action" fill(null)
SELECT max("value") FROM "serviceTimes.OK.p99" WHERE "process" =~ /$processName$/ AND "env" =~ /^$env$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "process", "action" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "serviceInstant.OK" WHERE "process" =~ /^$processName$/ AND "env" =~ /^$env$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "process", "action" fill(null)
SELECT max("value") FROM "serviceTimes.OK.p50" WHERE "process" =~ /$processName$/ AND "env" =~ /^$env$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "process", "action" fill(null)
SELECT max("value") FROM "serviceTimes.FAIL.p50" WHERE "process" =~ /$processName$/ AND "env" =~ /^$env$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "process", "action" fill(null)
SELECT max("value") FROM "serviceTimes.FAIL.p99" WHERE "process" =~ /$processName$/ AND "env" =~ /^$env$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "process", "action" fill(null)
SELECT max("value") FROM "serviceTimes.OK.p99" WHERE "process" =~ /$processName$/ AND "env" =~ /^$env$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "process", "action" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "serviceInstant.OK" WHERE "process" =~ /^$processName$/ AND "env" =~ /^$env$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "process", "action" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "error.instantRate" WHERE "process" =~ /$processName$/ AND "host" =~ /$hosts$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "process" fill(null)
SELECT max("value") FROM "records-lag-max" WHERE "host" =~ /$hosts$/ AND "process" =~ /$processName$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "process" fill(none)
SELECT min("value") FROM "eventtimedelay.min" WHERE "host" =~ /$hosts$/ AND "process" =~ /$processName$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "process" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "eventtimedelay.p50" WHERE "host" =~ /$hosts$/ AND "process" =~ /$processName$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "process" fill(null)
SELECT max("value") FROM "eventtimedelay.max" WHERE "host" =~ /$hosts$/ AND "process" =~ /$processName$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "process" fill(null)
SELECT min("value") FROM "eventtimedelay.min" WHERE "host" =~ /$hosts$/ AND "process" =~ /$processName$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "process" fill(null)
